elements.title: Vladimirka (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the subject of the painting Vladimirka (pictured) is a road that was used to transport prisoners to Siberia on foot?

elements.title: Bill Harkin (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Bill Harkin designed the original Glastonbury Festival Pyramid Stage, which was built from scaffolding and plastic sheeting?

elements.title: Sand Springs Railway (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that for decades, the Sand Springs Railway gave all of its profits to a children's home?

elements.title: John Dique (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that John Dique constructed the machine used by the first Australian patient to receive dialysis?

elements.title: Aquis Querquennis (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Roman fort Aquis Querquennis periodically emerges from a reservoir?

elements.title: Mike Goodman (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that casino pit boss Mike Goodman was the author of a book that sold over a million copies?

elements.title: its own private waterworks (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Youlgreave in Derbyshire is one of only a few villages in the United Kingdom to be supplied by its own private waterworks?

elements.title: WBML (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that radio station WBML made its first broadcast just one hour after the funeral of its manager-to-be?
